GP 19.1971" , and a date code of '''0733''' :is silkscreened on one U10C018's (U10C018.43) board. *[https://electronics360.globalspec.com/article/3518/ambit-ubee-u10c018-80-cable-modem-teardown ''Ambit (Ubee) U10C018.80 Cable Modem'' Teardown on '''e360Â°'''] :Modem: [[Broadcom]] BCM3349KFBG (Single-Chip, QAMLink, DOCSIS 2.0) :Tuner: [[Broadcom]] BCM3421KML (Single-Chip, Cable TV, DOCSIS 2.0) :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L1605AM2C-15G (NOR, 16Mb, SPI, 85MHz) :RAM: [[Samsung]] K4S641632K-UC75 (SDRAM 64Mb, 133MHz, 3.3V) :PSU: ''Ault, Inc.'' P48121000A060G - External Power Supply (12V/1A) *[https://www.amazon.com/dp/B00700Z6ZW?tag=wiki085-20 ''uBee Ambit U10C018 DOCSIS 2.0 Cable Modem'' on '''Amazon'''] :OUI: 88:9F:FA ([https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/81xJ-suz0rL._SX679_.jpg Label image]) ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== seems to be the following...
